metadata.title: CVE-2020-10767 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernel before 5.8-rc1 in the implementationof the Enhanced IBPB (Indirect Branch Prediction Barrier). The IBPBmitigation will be disabled when STIBP is not available or when theEnhanced Indirect Branch Restricted Speculation (IBRS) is available. Thisflaw allows a local attacker to perform a Spectre V2 style attack when thisconfiguration is active. The highest threat from this vulnerability is toconfidentiality.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
